content:
Scenario: Displaced person builds connection in new community
    Given Maria has relocated to a new city where she knows no one
    When she joins her new neighborhood community space
    And she participates in local mutual aid and support networks
    Then she can gradually build trust in her new community
    And neighbors help her find resources and employment
    And she establishes new relationships while processing loss
    And the new community welcomes her without requiring full disclosure
